newsitem.title: USA: Clinton to announce National Security personnel.
newsitem.headline: Clinton to announce National Security personnel.

text.p: U.S. President Bill Clinton will make an announcement on his national security appointments at 1330 EST (1830 GMT) on Thursday, White House spokesman Mike McCurry said.
"The president plans to make some announcements related to personnel in the national security area at 1:30," McCurry told reporters.
